Package controllers

Class YoutubeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Results
      • play.mvc.Controller
        • controllers.YoutubeController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.mvc.Http.HeaderNames, play.mvc.Http.Status
    public class YoutubeController
extends play.mvc.Controller

    This controller provides endpoints for searching YouTube videos, retrieving a video by ID, showing channel profiles, and displaying statistics about search queries. It uses the SearchService, StatisticsService, and YoutubeService to interact with YouTube data.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> search​(java.lang.String query,
                                                                    play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Search for videos with keywords creates a new session if one doesn't exist
        Parameters:
        query - string query to send to youtube api
        request - Http request of the browser
        Returns:
        returns the search page populated with the last 10 or less requests made

      • searchForm

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> searchForm​(play.mvc.Http.Request request)
        Creates a user session or retrieves an existing one
        Parameters:
        request - browser http request
        Returns:
        redirects to search page only the form is visible unless a user session exists

        public java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage<play.mvc.Result> videosByTag​(java.lang.String tag)
        Get the videos by tag, processes the video list, and renders the result.
        Parameters:
        tag - is the id used to search videos
        Returns:
        a CompletionStage is a result of either fetching the video list or an error page
